author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Experience Unforgettable Honeymoon Moments at Four Seasons Safari lodge SerengetiTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Experience Unforgettable Honeymoon Moments at Four Seasons Safari lodge Serengeti Published on : Tuesday, August 18, 2015
Surrounded by the breathtaking wilderness of the Serengeti National Park, what could be a more inspirational setting for the start of a new life together than Four Seasons Safari Lodge Serengeti? The luxury safari lodge is now offering newlywed couples the chance to experience their dream safari vacation with the launch of a newHoneymoon Package.
Whether toasting to a spectacular African sunset at the open air terrace at Maji Bar, on the lookout for one of the “big five” during a journey across the Serengeti plains, or relaxing and rejuvenating in a sensual couple’s massage at the Spa and Wellness Retreat, intuitive Four Seasons care and service tends to every concern, leaving guests to embrace each and every moment of their time on safari.
The Lodge, which is located in the heart of the Serengeti National Park, offers a choice of activities for couples, with available experiences ranging from an early morning hot air balloon safari to a magical bush dinner or meditation atop a nearby kopje at sunset. Couples may tailor each day to suit, as well as enjoying the inclusions of the new honeymoon package:
An upgrade to a Water Hole View room type for all Horizon and Savannah Rooms (subject to availability at the time of booking) A candlelit poolside dinner, just metres from the active animal watering hole One complimentary massage for the bride when booking a couple’s spa treatment Daily breakfast, lunch, dinner and beverages (including house wine, well spirits and local beer)
